sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"购买"之意。
means: buy ： 普通日常用词，既可指日常随意购物也可指大的购买。
purchase ： 正式用词，指大宗购货或购买重要东西。无感情色彩，强调物品的购得。

sentence.Network_en: Purchase tax was not payable on goods for export.
sentence.Network_cn: 出口商品不需要交购买税。

sentence.Network_en: Investors can borrow an amount equal to the property's purchase price.
sentence.Network_cn: 投资者可以获得与房产购买价格相等的借款额。

sentence.Network_en: When her deal is done, the client emerges with her purchase.
sentence.Network_cn: 交易完成后，委托人会出现并将她购买的东西交给她。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French pourchacier 'seek to obtain or bring about', the earliest sense also in English, which soon gave rise to the senses 'gain' (hence, in nautical use, the notion of ‘gaining’ one portion of rope after another) and 'buy'

entry.def: When you purchase something, you buy it.

example.ex: He purchased a ticket and went up on the top deck...
example.tran: 他买了一张票，然后上到顶层甲板。

example.ex: Most of those shares were purchased from brokers.
example.tran: 大部分的股份是从经纪人手中购得的。

entry.def: The purchase of something is the act of buying it.

example.ex: Some of the receipts had been for the purchase of cars.
example.tran: 其中一些收据是购买汽车时开的。

entry.def: A purchase is something that you buy.

example.ex: She opened the tie box and looked at her purchase. It was silk, with maroon stripes.
example.tran: 她打开领带盒，看着她买回的东西：一条带有褐红色条纹的丝制领带。

entry.def: If you get a purchase on something, you manage to get a firm grip on it.

example.ex: I got a purchase on the rope and pulled...
example.tran: 我紧抓住绳子，用力去拉。

example.ex: I couldn't get any purchase with the screwdriver on the damn screws.
example.tran: 我用螺丝刀拧那些该死的螺丝钉时一点也使不上劲儿。

means.word_mean: 1. the acquisition of something for payment;

sentences.sentence: "they closed the purchase with a handshake"

means.word_mean: 3. a means of exerting influence or gaining advantage;

sentences.sentence: "he could get no purchase on the situation"

means.word_mean: 4. the mechanical advantage gained by being in a position to use a lever
1. obtain by purchase; acquire by means of a financial transaction;

sentences.sentence: "She buys for the big department store"

auth_sentence.content: By all means purchase if that's your bag.
auth_sentence.res_content: By all means purchase if that's your bag.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By all means purchase if that's your bag.

auth_sentence.content: Their boss Peter Long is pleased with his purchase.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their boss Peter Long is pleased with his purchase.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their boss Peter Long is pleased with his purchase.

auth_sentence.content: Try dollar-cost averaging -- purchase units at regular intervals.
auth_sentence.res_content: Try dollar-cost averaging -- purchase units at regular intervals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Try dollar-cost averaging -- purchase units at regular intervals.

Sentence.sentence: When you purchase a used print book, it comes with its previous owner's highlights and notes in the margins.
Furthermore, students will be able to purchase sections of the text instead of buying the whole thing, with individual chapters costing as little as $
The special features can add $25,000 or more to the purchase price of a house
The first is"If I purchase a corporate bond,do I have to hold it until the maturity date?
Apple stands to win as well, hooking more young consumers with decades of technology purchases ahead of them.
He also said that he could not discuss discounts to universities for bulk purchases

sentences.en: Farm and sideline products of the peasants are purchased by the state at reasonable prices.
sentences.cn: 农民的农副产品由国家按合理价格收购。

sentences.en: They purchased life at the expense of honour.
sentences.cn: 他们以牺牲名誉为代价换得了生命。

sentences.en: Expert flattery may purchase an honest man.
sentences.cn: 老练的阿谀奉承可以买动一个老实人。

sentences.en: They made the purchase of a car.
sentences.cn: 他们购置了一辆小汽车。

sentences.en: That hat was a good purchase.

jushi.english: My brother purchased three walking tractors.
jushi.chinese: 我兄弟买了三台拖拉机。

jushi.english: Most equipment on the dairy farm was purchased with the worker's own earnings.
jushi.chinese: 这个奶场的大部分设备都是工人们自己的劳动收益换来的。
